alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Nueces; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Aransas, Calhoun, southern Nueces, San Patricio, southeastern Victoria, Refugio and northeastern Kleberg Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles east of Port Oconnor to Del Mar College Windward Campus. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Portland, Robstown, Rockport, Sinton, Port Aransas, Taft, Refugio, Woodsboro, Seadrift, McFaddin, Corpus Christi International Airport, Lamar, Ingleside, Aransas Pass, Odem, Gregory, Ingleside On The Bay, Bayside and Quintana. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 1 and 19. US Highway 181 between mile markers 618 and 648. US Highway 183 between mile markers 664 and 668. US Highway 77 between mile markers 600 and 674. US Highway 87 between mile markers 828 and 838. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
